snippet: Issues surrounding the drafting of ultra-Orthodox men and Arab citizens into the military or national service mask more fundamental questions in Israel.
abstract: Issues surrounding the drafting of ultra-Orthodox men and Arab citizens into the military or national service mask more fundamental questions in Israel; debate over details is about the evolving identity in this still-young state, where a 'people’s army' has long been a defining principle, and about the growing cleavage among its tribes; issue has brought Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu’s broad unity coalition to the brink of collapse.
lead_paragraph: Issues surrounding the drafting of ultra-Orthodox men and Arab citizens into the military or national service mask more fundamental questions in Israel.

headline.seo: National Identity at Heart of Debate on Israeli Service
headline.main: Israeli Identity Is at the Heart of a Debate on Service
headline.print_headline: Israeli Identity Is at the Heart Of a Debate On Service
